parse.title: List of dialling codes in Italy

text.*:
Country Code: +39
International Call Prefix: 00
Trunk Prefix: None. Leading 0 is dialed both within and from outside Italy, just because it is now part of the actual number and no longer the trunk prefix.

Area codes in Italy are administered by Telecom Italia:

Contents

  • 1 Zone 1 - Liguria, Piedmont, and Aosta Valley
  • 2 Zone 2 - City of Milan and nearby areas
  • 3 Zone 3 - Eastern Piedmont and Rest of Lombardy
  • 4 Zone 4 - Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol and Veneto
  • 5 Zone 5 - Emilia-Romagna and Tuscany
  • 6 Zone 6 - City of Rome, Vatican City and nearby areas
  • 7 Zone 7 - Marche, Lazio, Umbria and Sardinia
  • 8 Zone 8 - Abruzzo, Molise, Campania and Apulia
  • 9 Zone 9 - Calabria, Sicily, Basilicata, rest of Apulia
  • 10 References
  • 11 See also
